Hotel Kempinski - Estepona Grand Luxe

Kempinski Hotel Bahía Beach Resort & Spa is a luxurious beachfront hotel overlooking the Mediterranean, just 15 minutes’ drive from Puerto Banus. It features 3 outdoor swimming pools, gardens and a spa.

Rooms at the Kempinski Marbella are luxurious and feature a balcony or terrace. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a marble bathroom with hairdryer.

Facilities at the Kempinski Hotel Bahía Beach Resort & Spa include a fitness studio with free fitness activities and tennis courts. The hotel spa has a sauna, steam room, indoor pool, and 6 treatment rooms.

The Kempinski has a buffet restaurant and 3 further restaurants, offering a range of Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink on the terrace or at the poolside snack bar.

Location: Estepona
